name: Slatra
description:
A banished Valkyrie is summoned as a last resort, when the damned are pouring out of Helheim.

.

.

3 different weapons!

3 type of enemies!!

Out-of-this-realm gore effects !!!

.

Slatra means to slaughter or butcher

.

Not finished, only 1 level. Used most of the time learning and brushing dust off of my pixelart skills.

Hope you like it, leave a comment! :)
